message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I know you've been interested in. This product is incredibly valuable, and I believe it would be a great asset to your company. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000.  This is a price that allows me to make a good profit while still ensuring you get a fair deal.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
